Node.definition: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
literally: (one's) hands are weak; hence: = state in which humans lack the confidence to perform a certain event

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ishbosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Baanah (בַּעֲנָה) and Rechab (רֵכָב) murderers of king Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= inhabitant of Beeroth (בְּאֵרֹות) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= town, possibly to be identified with Beer (בְּאֵר) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► one of the four Hivite (חִוִּי) cities that made a covenant (בְּרִית) with Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= inhabitant of Beeroth (בְּאֵרֹות) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► location where the Beerothites (בְּאֵרֹות) found refuge

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= man; ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► friend of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► friend of David (דָּוִד)
= town and valley; ◄ territory of Issachar (יִשָּׂשכָר)

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= man or woman responsible for raising and educating one or more children on behalf of the parents
= process by which humans or animals are overcome by a sudden uncontrollable fear or anxiety resulting in a frenzied hurry to run away
= process by which humans or animals lose their balance while walking or standing and end up flat on the ground; ≈ associated with failure and loss of face
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

= man; ◄ son of Jonathan (יְהֹונָתָן) and grandson of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► father of Micah (מִיכָה) allowed to live in David (דָּוִד) palace out of loyalty towards Jonathan
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Baanah (בַּעֲנָה) and Rechab (רֵכָב) murderers of king Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= inhabitant of Beeroth (בְּאֵרֹות) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ishbosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= state in which the atmosphere has a relatively high temperature
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= man, also known as Ishvi (יִשְׁוִי) whose real name probably was Eshbaal (אֶשְׁבַּעַל) but which was changed in order to remove any reference to Baal (בַּעַל) ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► succeeded his father as king of the northern tribes until he was assassinated and David (דָּוִד) took his place
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the time of the day when the sun is at its highest point
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= area located below diaphragm, containing stomach and bowels and other contents
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ishbosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sit or sleep on
= area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: road; hence: = a location that needs to be passed to get from one place to another
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= man, also known as Ishvi (יִשְׁוִי) whose real name probably was Eshbaal (אֶשְׁבַּעַל) but which was changed in order to remove any reference to Baal (בַּעַל) ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► succeeded his father as king of the northern tribes until he was assassinated and David (דָּוִד) took his place
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= man, also known as Ishvi (יִשְׁוִי) whose real name probably was Eshbaal (אֶשְׁבַּעַל) but which was changed in order to remove any reference to Baal (בַּעַל) ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► succeeded his father as king of the northern tribes until he was assassinated and David (דָּוִד) took his place
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong and so find relief from their anger

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Rimmon (רִמֹּון) ► murderer of king Ishbosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Baanah (בַּעֲנָה) and Rechab (רֵכָב) murderers of king Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת)
= inhabitant of Beeroth (בְּאֵרֹות) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans pass on information to someone else, having been commissioned to do so by a deity or another person

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

= town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) ► belonged to Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) and given to David (דָּוִד) before he moved to Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where he was made king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= something given to a messenger as a reward for his/her effort

marker pointing to information that substantiates a particular assertion even more conclusively than previous information, which was presented in an immediately preceding utterance as an valid substantiation of that assertion
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to hold responsible|to call to account|to seek an occasion against (someone else)
Node.definition: literallly: to seek from (someone else's) hand; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities lay the responsiblity for something that happened on someone else and require compensation or punishment

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
literally: (someone's) hand; = state in which humans bear the responsibility for a certain situation

Node.gloss: to sweep away|to put away|to get rid of|to do away with|to remove|to clear out|to purge|to destroy
Node.definition: = action by which someone makes sure that a certain object is no longer found anywhere at all, ◄ as if it were completely consumed by fire

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= causative action by which humans remove part of an object with a sharp tool

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= relatively large reservoir ◄ dug by human hands ► to collect water; place where many public activities take place
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= man, also known as Ishvi (יִשְׁוִי) whose real name probably was Eshbaal (אֶשְׁבַּעַל) but which was changed in order to remove any reference to Baal (בַּעַל) ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► succeeded his father as king of the northern tribes until he was assassinated and David (דָּוִד) took his place

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
